general.gigTitle: design and develop an awesome responsive website for you

sellerCard.oneLiner: UI UX Designer, Web developer, Digital Marketing Enthusiast
sellerCard.description:
•	Web Design and Development
•	UI/UX designing
•	Mobile App design
•	SEO expert 
•	Graphics designing 
•	Creative writing

description.content:
[ Hi, Send me a message before making the order so that we can discuss the project in detail. ]


CUSTOM CODED ( contact me for more info on sites that are coded from scratch ) 

[HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Bootstrap, etc]

or CMS BASED WEBSITES

- WordPress, Drupal, Shopify, Squarespace, Wix, etc.


Looking for a creative and knowledgeable Web Developer? Search no further, because I am ready for the job. I am an experienced Web developer and Designer, I will step in and make an immediate contribution to your projects success.

  • I can also do digital marketing works for your website


I work directly with clients to develop scopes and manage project milestones. I am innovative, a strong decision maker, and have excellent communication skills.


I can provide -

+ Complete responsive website (Design & Development)

+ Cross-Platform Support

+ Ecommerce 

+ UI/UX

+ Multilingual

+ SSL

+ Search Optimization

+ Domain Verification

+ Analytics

+ Sitemap

+ Gzip compression, live Instagram feed + more


For some projects the cost can be higher or lower than the gig package rates depending on the type of Website, Design and Features needed. Please contact me to CREATE A CUSTOM ORDER.

slide.name: design and develop an awesome responsive website for you
design and develop an awesome responsive website for you
design and develop an awesome responsive website for you

questionsAndAnswers.question: What other features are included?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
customized mobile-responsive theme 
– custom home/landing page
– custom logo
– custom color scheme
– custom typography
– navigation bar
– blog setup & styling
– contact form
– social media buttons
– fav icon
– installation

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need the login details for your domain and hosing accounts. If you don't have these yet, I can assist you in getting these and setting it up. I'll also need your official logo and the main details of your company. If you have links for any reference websites, send those too.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is it easy to manage the website after it’s built?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Based on clients requirements a back-end dashboard can be made through which the website can be managed. I make this based on what the client needs and you will be able to use the dashboard without having any coding knowledge / experience.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer PSD to responsive html development ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, feel free to contact me to discuss the details of your project. A custom order can be created based on the work.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I contact you later if I need any help with the site?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes you can. You can contact me for any questions / help for the website. I provide continued support for all my clients. So, feel free to message me.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be responsive / work on all devices?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes the website will be responsive. It will work on all devices. The site will be designed and built to work on all devices like Desktop's, Laptops, Tablets and Phones.

reviews.comment: Really nice to have worked with George. He understood the assignment and was very professional. I have more projects to come and will continue working with George.

seller_response.comment: Awesome experience working with Christina on this website development project!

reviews.comment: George did an amazing job! It exceeded my expectation due to the eye for detail and delivered the job wiithin a week. don't look any further!

seller_response.comment: Awesome experience working with tomvanderzaal on this project website development project!

reviews.comment: Cannot say enough good things. Value, efficiency, level of understanding as well as high skill levels, highly recommended!

seller_response.comment: Awesome experience working with tfower28 on this website development project!!

reviews_snippet.comment: Really nice to have worked with George. He understood the assignment and was very professional. I have more projects to come and will continue working with George.

George was extremely helpful throughout the whole process - helping me every step of the way and being extremely communicative. He delivered exactly what I needed. He took my freelance website brief and went above and beyond to create a website I was very happy with! I would highly recommend his services.
George did an amazing job! It exceeded my expectation due to the eye for detail and delivered the job wiithin a week. don't look any further!
George is extremely knowledgable and very efficient. He has top notch communication and really goes out of his way to help you! Thank you so much. Would 10000% recommend him!

Perfect as always.  Very responsive and great attantion to detail.  Truly and consistently exceeds expectations.  I would highly recommend George and am very greatful for the quality of the output and the look, feel and effort that went into the design, launch and maintenance of the website.
